Move.Name: Pound
Move.Description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

Move.Name: Karate Chop
Move.Description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Double Slap
Move.Description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Comet Punch
Move.Description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Mega Punch
Move.Description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

Move.Name: Pay Day
Move.Description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

Move.Name: Fire Punch
Move.Description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Ice Punch
Move.Description: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

Move.Name: Thunder Punch
Move.Description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Scratch
Move.Description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Vice Grip
Move.Description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Guillotine
Move.Description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

Move.Name: Razor Wind
Move.Description: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pok√©mon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Swords Dance
Move.Description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

Move.Name: Cut
Move.Description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw. This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

Move.Name: Gust
Move.Description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Wing Attack
Move.Description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Whirlwind
Move.Description: The target is blown away, and a different Pok√©mon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pok√©mon.

Move.Name: Fly
Move.Description: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.

Move.Name: Bind
Move.Description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Move.Name: Slam
Move.Description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Vine Whip
Move.Description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Stomp
Move.Description: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Double Kick
Move.Description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

Move.Name: Mega Kick
Move.Description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

Move.Name: Jump Kick
Move.Description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

Move.Name: Rolling Kick
Move.Description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Sand Attack
Move.Description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

Move.Name: Headbutt
Move.Description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Horn Attack
Move.Description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Fury Attack
Move.Description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Horn Drill
Move.Description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

Move.Name: Tackle
Move.Description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

Move.Name: Body Slam
Move.Description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Wrap
Move.Description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Move.Name: Take Down
Move.Description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

Move.Name: Thrash
Move.Description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Move.Name: Double-Edge
Move.Description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Move.Name: Tail Whip
Move.Description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pok√©mon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

Move.Name: Poison Sting
Move.Description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

Move.Name: Twineedle
Move.Description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

Move.Name: Pin Missile
Move.Description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Leer
Move.Description: The user gives opposing Pok√©mon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

Move.Name: Bite
Move.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Growl
Move.Description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pok√©mon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.

Move.Name: Roar
Move.Description: The target is scared off, and a different Pok√©mon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pok√©mon.

Move.Name: Sing
Move.Description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

Move.Name: Supersonic
Move.Description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

Move.Name: Sonic Boom
Move.Description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

Move.Name: Disable
Move.Description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

Move.Name: Acid
Move.Description: The opposing Pok√©mon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Ember
Move.Description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Ember
Move.Description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Flamethrower
Move.Description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Mist
Move.Description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

Move.Name: Water Gun
Move.Description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

Move.Name: Hydro Pump
Move.Description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

Move.Name: Surf
Move.Description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

Move.Name: Ice Beam
Move.Description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

Move.Name: Blizzard
Move.Description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pok√©mon. This may also leave the opposing Pok√©mon frozen.

Move.Name: Psybeam
Move.Description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

Move.Name: Bubble Beam
Move.Description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

Move.Name: Aurora Beam
Move.Description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Move.Name: Hyper Beam
Move.Description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

Move.Name: Peck
Move.Description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

Move.Name: Drill Peck
Move.Description: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

Move.Name: Submission
Move.Description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

Move.Name: Low Kick
Move.Description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Counter
Move.Description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Move.Name: Seismic Toss
Move.Description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

Move.Name: Strength
Move.Description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

Move.Name: Absorb
Move.Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Move.Name: Mega Drain
Move.Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Move.Name: Leech Seed
Move.Description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

Move.Name: Growth
Move.Description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Move.Name: Razor Leaf
Move.Description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pok√©mon. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Solar Beam
Move.Description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

Move.Name: Poison Powder
Move.Description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

Move.Name: Stun Spore
Move.Description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

Move.Name: Sleep Powder
Move.Description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

Move.Name: Petal Dance
Move.Description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Move.Name: String Shot
Move.Description: The opposing Pok√©mon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

Move.Name: Dragon Rage
Move.Description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

Move.Name: Fire Spin
Move.Description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

Move.Name: Thunder Shock
Move.Description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Thunderbolt
Move.Description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Thunder Wave
Move.Description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

Move.Name: Thunder
Move.Description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Rock Throw
Move.Description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

Move.Name: Earthquake
Move.Description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pok√©mon around it.

Move.Name: Fissure
Move.Description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

Move.Name: Dig
Move.Description: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.

Move.Name: Toxic
Move.Description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

Move.Name: Confusion
Move.Description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

Move.Name: Psychic
Move.Description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Hypnosis
Move.Description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

Move.Name: Meditate
Move.Description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

Move.Name: Agility
Move.Description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

Move.Name: Quick Attack
Move.Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

Move.Name: Rage
Move.Description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

Move.Name: Teleport
Move.Description: Use it to flee from any wild Pok√©mon.

Move.Name: Night Shade
Move.Description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

Move.Name: Mimic
Move.Description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pok√©mon is switched out.

Move.Name: Screech
Move.Description: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

Move.Name: Double Team
Move.Description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

Move.Name: Recover
Move.Description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

Move.Name: Harden
Move.Description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

Move.Name: Minimize
Move.Description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

Move.Name: Smokescreen
Move.Description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

Move.Name: Confuse Ray
Move.Description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

Move.Name: Withdraw
Move.Description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

Move.Name: Defense Curl
Move.Description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

Move.Name: Barrier
Move.Description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

Move.Name: Light Screen
Move.Description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

Move.Name: Haze
Move.Description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pok√©mon engaged in battle.

Move.Name: Reflect
Move.Description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

Move.Name: Focus Energy
Move.Description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Bide
Move.Description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

Move.Name: Metronome
Move.Description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

Move.Name: Mirror Move
Move.Description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

Move.Name: self-Destruct
Move.Description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

Move.Name: Egg Bomb
Move.Description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Lick
Move.Description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Smog
Move.Description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

Move.Name: Sludge
Move.Description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

Move.Name: Bone Club
Move.Description: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Fire Blast
Move.Description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Waterfall
Move.Description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

Move.Name: Clamp
Move.Description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

Move.Name: Swift
Move.Description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pok√©mon. This attack never misses.

Move.Name: Skull Bash
Move.Description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

Move.Name: Spike Cannon
Move.Description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Constrict
Move.Description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

Move.Name: Amnesia
Move.Description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Kinesis
Move.Description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

Move.Name: Soft-Boiled
Move.Description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

Move.Name: High Jump Kick
Move.Description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

Move.Name: Glare
Move.Description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

Move.Name: Dream Eater
Move.Description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

Move.Name: Poison Gas
Move.Description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pok√©mon, poisoning those hit.

Move.Name: Barrage
Move.Description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Leech Life
Move.Description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Move.Name: Lovely Kiss
Move.Description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

Move.Name: Sky Attack
Move.Description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Transform
Move.Description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

Move.Name: Bubble
Move.Description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pok√©mon. This may also lower their Speed stat.

Move.Name: Dizzy Punch
Move.Description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

Move.Name: Spore
Move.Description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

Move.Name: Flash
Move.Description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy.

Move.Name: Psywave
Move.Description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

Move.Name: Splash
Move.Description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

Move.Name: Acid Armor
Move.Description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

Move.Name: Crabhammer
Move.Description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Explosion
Move.Description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

Move.Name: Fury Swipes
Move.Description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Bonemerang
Move.Description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice‚Äîcoming and going.

Move.Name: Rest
Move.Description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

Move.Name: Rock Slide
Move.Description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pok√©mon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pok√©mon flinch.

Move.Name: Hyper Fang
Move.Description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Sharpen
Move.Description: The user makes its edges more jagged, which raises its Attack stat.

Move.Name: Conversion
Move.Description: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

Move.Name: Tri Attack
Move.Description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

Move.Name: Super Fang
Move.Description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

Move.Name: Slash
Move.Description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Substitute
Move.Description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

Move.Name: Struggle
Move.Description: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.

Move.Name: Sketch
Move.Description: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

Move.Name: Triple Kick
Move.Description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

Move.Name: Thief
Move.Description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

Move.Name: Spider Web
Move.Description: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.

Move.Name: Mind Reader
Move.Description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

Move.Name: Nightmare
Move.Description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

Move.Name: Flame Wheel
Move.Description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Snore
Move.Description: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Curse
Move.Description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

Move.Name: Flail
Move.Description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Conversion2
Move.Description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

Move.Name: Aeroblast
Move.Description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Cotton Spore
Move.Description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pok√©mon, which harshly lowers their Speed stat.

Move.Name: Reversal
Move.Description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

Move.Name: Spite
Move.Description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

Move.Name: Powder Snow
Move.Description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokemon.

Move.Name: Protect
Move.Description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Move.Name: Mach Punch
Move.Description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

Move.Name: Scary Face
Move.Description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

Move.Name: Feint Attack
Move.Description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

Move.Name: Sweet Kiss
Move.Description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

Move.Name: Belly Drum
Move.Description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

Move.Name: Sludge Bomb
Move.Description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

Move.Name: Mud-Slap
Move.Description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

Move.Name: Octazooka
Move.Description: The user attacks by spraying ink at the target's face or eyes. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

Move.Name: Spikes
Move.Description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pok√©mon that switch into battle.

Move.Name: Zap Cannon
Move.Description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

Move.Name: Foresight
Move.Description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Move.Name: Destiny Bond
Move.Description: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pok√©mon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Move.Name: Perish Song
Move.Description: Any Pok√©mon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

Move.Name: Icy Wind
Move.Description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pok√©mon's Speed stats.

Move.Name: Detect
Move.Description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Move.Name: Bone Rush
Move.Description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Lock-On
Move.Description: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the next attack does not miss the target.

Move.Name: Outrage
Move.Description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Move.Name: Sandstorm
Move.Description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

Move.Name: Giga Drain
Move.Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Move.Name: Endure
Move.Description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Move.Name: Charm
Move.Description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.

Move.Name: Rollout
Move.Description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

Move.Name: False Swipe
Move.Description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

Move.Name: Swagger
Move.Description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

Move.Name: Milk Drink
Move.Description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

Move.Name: Spark
Move.Description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Fury Cutter
Move.Description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

Move.Name: Steel Wing
Move.Description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.

Move.Name: Mean Look
Move.Description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

Move.Name: Attract
Move.Description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

Move.Name: Sleep Talk
Move.Description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

Move.Name: Heal Bell
Move.Description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pok√©mon.

Move.Name: Return
Move.Description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

Move.Name: Present
Move.Description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

Move.Name: Frustration
Move.Description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

Move.Name: Safeguard
Move.Description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

Move.Name: Pain Split
Move.Description: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

Move.Name: Sacred Fire
Move.Description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Magnitude
Move.Description: The user attacks everything around it with a ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

Move.Name: Dynamic Punch
Move.Description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

Move.Name: Megahorn
Move.Description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

Move.Name: Dragon Breath
Move.Description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Baton Pass
Move.Description: The user switches places with a party Pok√©mon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

Move.Name: Encore
Move.Description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

Move.Name: Pursuit
Move.Description: The power of this attack move is doubled if it's used on a target that's switching out of battle.

Move.Name: Rapid Spin
Move.Description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

Move.Name: Sweet Scent
Move.Description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pok√©mon's evasiveness.

Move.Name: Iron Tail
Move.Description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Move.Name: Metal Claw
Move.Description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

Move.Name: Vital Throw
Move.Description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

Move.Name: Morning Sun
Move.Description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Move.Name: Synthesis
Move.Description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Move.Name: Moonlight
Move.Description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Move.Name: Hidden Power
Move.Description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pok√©mon using it.

Move.Name: Cross Chop
Move.Description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Twister
Move.Description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pok√©mon. This may also make them flinch.

Move.Name: Rain Dance
Move.Description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.

Move.Name: Sunny Day
Move.Description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.

Move.Name: Crunch
Move.Description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Move.Name: Mirror Coat
Move.Description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Move.Name: Psych Up
Move.Description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

Move.Name: Extreme Speed
Move.Description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

Move.Name: Ancient Power
Move.Description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

Move.Name: Shadow Ball
Move.Description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Future Sight
Move.Description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

Move.Name: Rock Smash
Move.Description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Move.Name: Whirlpool
Move.Description: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

Move.Name: Beat Up
Move.Description: The user gets all party Pok√©mon to attack the target. The more party Pok√©mon, the greater the number of attacks.

Move.Name: Fake Out
Move.Description: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

Move.Name: Uproar
Move.Description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pok√©mon can fall asleep.

Move.Name: Stockpile
Move.Description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. stats. The move can be used three times.

Move.Name: Spit Up
Move.Description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Swallow
Move.Description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

Move.Name: Heat Wave
Move.Description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pok√©mon. This may also leave those Pok√©mon with a burn.

Move.Name: Hail
Move.Description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pok√©mon except the Ice type.

Move.Name: Torment
Move.Description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

Move.Name: Flatter
Move.Description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Will-O-Wisp
Move.Description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Move.Name: Memento
Move.Description: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Move.Name: Facade
Move.Description: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

Move.Name: Focus Punch
Move.Description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

Move.Name: Smelling Salts
Move.Description: This attack's power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target's paralysis, however.

Move.Name: Follow Me
Move.Description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

Move.Name: Nature Power
Move.Description: This attack makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment.

Move.Name: Charge
Move.Description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Taunt
Move.Description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Move.Name: Helping Hand
Move.Description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

Move.Name: Trick
Move.Description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

Move.Name: Role Play
Move.Description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

Move.Name: Wish
Move.Description: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by half the user's max HP.

Move.Name: Assist
Move.Description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by ally Pok√©mon.

Move.Name: Ingrain
Move.Description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it's rooted, it can't switch out.

Move.Name: Superpower
Move.Description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

Move.Name: Magic Coat
Move.Description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

Move.Name: Recycle
Move.Description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

Move.Name: Revenge
Move.Description: This attack move's power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

Move.Name: Brick Break
Move.Description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Move.Name: Yawn
Move.Description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

Move.Name: Knock Off
Move.Description: The user slaps down the target's held item, and that item can't be used in that battle. The move does more damage if the target has a held item.

Move.Name: Endeavor
Move.Description: This attack move cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

Move.Name: Eruption
Move.Description: The user attacks opposing Pok√©mon with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

Move.Name: Skill Swap
Move.Description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

Move.Name: Imprison
Move.Description: If opposing Pok√©mon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

Move.Name: Refresh
Move.Description: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.

Move.Name: Grudge
Move.Description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

Move.Name: Snatch
Move.Description: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.

Move.Name: Secret Power
Move.Description: The additional effects of this attack depend upon where it was used.

Move.Name: Dive
Move.Description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

Move.Name: Arm Thrust
Move.Description: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Camouflage
Move.Description: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

Move.Name: Tail Glow
Move.Description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Luster Purge
Move.Description: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Mist Ball
Move.Description: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Feather Dance
Move.Description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

Move.Name: Teeter Dance
Move.Description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pok√©mon around it.

Move.Name: Blaze Kick
Move.Description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Mud Sport
Move.Description: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

Move.Name: Ice Ball
Move.Description: The user attacks the target for five turns. The move's power increases each time it hits.

Move.Name: Needle Arm
Move.Description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Slack Off
Move.Description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

Move.Name: Hyper Voice
Move.Description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

Move.Name: Poison Fang
Move.Description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

Move.Name: Crush Claw
Move.Description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense.

Move.Name: Blast Burn
Move.Description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can't move on the next turn.

Move.Name: Hydro Cannon
Move.Description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.

Move.Name: Meteor Mash
Move.Description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

Move.Name: Astonish
Move.Description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Weather Ball
Move.Description: This attack move varies in power and type depending on the weather.

Move.Name: Aromatherapy
Move.Description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user's party.

Move.Name: Fake Tears
Move.Description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Air Cutter
Move.Description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pok√©mon. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Overheat
Move.Description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Odor Sleuth
Move.Description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Move.Name: Rock Tomb
Move.Description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by preventing its movement.

Move.Name: Silver Wind
Move.Description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user's stats.

Move.Name: Metal Sound
Move.Description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Grass Whistle
Move.Description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

Move.Name: Tickle
Move.Description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

Move.Name: Cosmic Power
Move.Description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Move.Name: Water Spout
Move.Description: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pok√©mon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

Move.Name: Signal Beam
Move.Description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.

Move.Name: Shadow Punch
Move.Description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

Move.Name: Extrasensory
Move.Description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Sky Uppercut
Move.Description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

Move.Name: Sand Tomb
Move.Description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

Move.Name: Sheer Cold
Move.Description: The target faints instantly. It's less likely to hit the target if it's used by Pok√©mon other than Ice types.

Move.Name: Muddy Water
Move.Description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pok√©mon. This may also lower their accuracy.

Move.Name: Bullet Seed
Move.Description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Aerial Ace
Move.Description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

Move.Name: Icicle Spear
Move.Description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

Move.Name: Iron Defense
Move.Description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

Move.Name: Block
Move.Description: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

Move.Name: Howl
Move.Description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises its Attack stat.

Move.Name: Dragon Claw
Move.Description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

Move.Name: Frenzy Plant
Move.Description: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn.

Move.Name: Bulk Up
Move.Description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

Move.Name: Bounce
Move.Description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Moves.Move:
340 Mud Shot The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat. 4 1 15 55 0.95 1 1 1 1 1 0 false false foe 4W
4 -1 1 foe -1

Move.Name: Poison Tail
Move.Description: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Covet
Move.Description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

Move.Name: Volt Tackle
Move.Description: The user electrifies itself, then charges. It also damages the user quite a lot. This may leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Magical Leaf
Move.Description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

Move.Name: Water Sport
Move.Description: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

Move.Name: Calm Mind
Move.Description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

Move.Name: Leaf Blade
Move.Description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Dragon Dance
Move.Description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

Move.Name: Rock Blast
Move.Description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

Move.Name: Shock Wave
Move.Description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

Move.Name: Water Pulse
Move.Description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

Move.Name: Doom Desire
Move.Description: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light.

Move.Name: Psycho Boost
Move.Description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Roost
Move.Description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

Move.Name: Gravity
Move.Description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitate.

Move.Name: Miracle Eye
Move.Description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Move.Name: Wake-Up Slap
Move.Description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.

Move.Name: Hammer Arm
Move.Description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

Move.Name: Gyro Ball
Move.Description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Healing Wish
Move.Description: The user faints. In return, the Pok√©mon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

Move.Name: Brine
Move.Description: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

Move.Name: Natural Gift
Move.Description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move's type and power.

Move.Name: Feint
Move.Description: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

Move.Name: Pluck
Move.Description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Move.Name: Tailwind
Move.Description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

Move.Name: Acupressure
Move.Description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.

Move.Name: Metal Burst
Move.Description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

Move.Name: U-Turn
Move.Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pok√©mon in waiting.

Move.Name: Close Combat
Move.Description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Move.Name: Payback
Move.Description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

Move.Name: Assurance
Move.Description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

Move.Name: Embargo
Move.Description: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

Move.Name: Fling
Move.Description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

Move.Name: Psycho Shift
Move.Description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.

Move.Name: Trump Card
Move.Description: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

Move.Name: Heal Block
Move.Description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

Move.Name: Wring Out
Move.Description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Power Trick
Move.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

Move.Name: Gastro Acid
Move.Description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

Move.Name: Lucky Chant
Move.Description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pok√©mon from landing critical hits for five turns.

Move.Name: Me First
Move.Description: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target's intended move with greater power. This move fails if it isn't used first.

Move.Name: Copycat
Move.Description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

Move.Name: Power Swap
Move.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

Move.Name: Guard Swap
Move.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

Move.Name: Punishment
Move.Description: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Last Resort
Move.Description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

Move.Name: Worry Seed
Move.Description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

Move.Name: Sucker Punch
Move.Description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

Move.Name: Toxic Spikes
Move.Description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pok√©mon that switch into battle.

Move.Name: Heart Swap
Move.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

Move.Name: Aqua Ring
Move.Description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

Move.Name: Magnet Rise
Move.Description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

Move.Name: Flare Blitz
Move.Description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This may leave the target with a burn.

Move.Name: Force Palm
Move.Description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Move.Name: Aura Sphere
Move.Description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

Move.Name: Rock Polish
Move.Description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

Move.Name: Poison Jab
Move.Description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

Move.Name: Dark Pulse
Move.Description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Night Slash
Move.Description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Aqua Tail
Move.Description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

Move.Name: Seed Bomb
Move.Description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

Move.Name: Air Slash
Move.Description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: X-Scissor
Move.Description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

Move.Name: Bug Buzz
Move.Description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Dragon Pulse
Move.Description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

Move.Name: Dragon Rush
Move.Description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Power Gem
Move.Description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

Move.Name: Drain Punch
Move.Description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Move.Name: Vacuum Wave
Move.Description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

Move.Name: Focus Blast
Move.Description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Energy Ball
Move.Description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Brave Bird
Move.Description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Move.Name: Earth Power
Move.Description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Switcheroo
Move.Description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

Move.Name: Giga Impact
Move.Description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

Move.Name: Nasty Plot
Move.Description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Bullet Punch
Move.Description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

Move.Name: Avalanche
Move.Description: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

Move.Name: Ice Shard
Move.Description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

Move.Name: Shadow Claw
Move.Description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Thunder Fang
Move.Description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

Move.Name: Ice Fang
Move.Description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

Move.Name: Fire Fang
Move.Description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

Move.Name: Shadow Sneak
Move.Description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

Move.Name: Mud Bomb
Move.Description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

Move.Name: Psycho Cut
Move.Description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Zen Headbutt
Move.Description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Mirror Shot
Move.Description: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

Move.Name: Flash Cannon
Move.Description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Rock Climb
Move.Description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

Move.Name: Defog
Move.Description: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

Move.Name: Trick Room
Move.Description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pok√©mon get to move first for five turns.

Move.Name: Draco Meteor
Move.Description: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Discharge
Move.Description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

Move.Name: Lava Plume
Move.Description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

Move.Name: Leaf Storm
Move.Description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Power Whip
Move.Description: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to harshly lash the target.

Move.Name: Rock Wrecker
Move.Description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

Move.Name: Cross Poison
Move.Description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Gunk Shot
Move.Description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

Move.Name: Iron Head
Move.Description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

Move.Name: Magnet Bomb
Move.Description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.

Move.Name: Stone Edge
Move.Description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Captivate
Move.Description: If any opposing Pok√©mon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Stealth Rock
Move.Description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pok√©mon that switch into battle.

Move.Name: Grass Knot
Move.Description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Chatter
Move.Description: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

Move.Name: Judgement
Move.Description: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.

Move.Name: Bug Bite
Move.Description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Move.Name: Charge Beam
Move.Description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

Move.Name: Wood Hammer
Move.Description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Move.Name: Aqua Jet
Move.Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

Move.Name: Attack Order
Move.Description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Defend Order
Move.Description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Move.Name: Heal Order
Move.Description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

Move.Name: Head Smash
Move.Description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

Move.Name: Double Hit
Move.Description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

Move.Name: Roar of Time
Move.Description: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can't move on the next turn.

Move.Name: Spacial Rend
Move.Description: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

Move.Name: Lunar Dance
Move.Description: The user faints. In return, the Pok√©mon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

Move.Name: Crush Grip
Move.Description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move's power.

Move.Name: Magma Storm
Move.Description: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

Move.Name: Dark Void
Move.Description: Opposing Pok√©mon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

Move.Name: Seed Flare
Move.Description: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Move.Name: Ominous Wind
Move.Description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.

Move.Name: Shadow Force
Move.Description: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

Move.Name: Hone Claws
Move.Description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

Move.Name: Wide Guard
Move.Description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

Move.Name: Guard Swap
Move.Description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

Move.Name: Power Split
Move.Description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

Move.Name: Wonder Room
Move.Description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pok√©mon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

Move.Name: Psyshock
Move.Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

Move.Name: Venoshock
Move.Description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

Move.Name: Autotomize
Move.Description: heds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

Move.Name: Rage Powder
Move.Description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

Move.Name: Telekinesis
Move.Description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

Move.Name: Magic Room
Move.Description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pok√©mon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

Move.Name: Smack Down
Move.Description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pok√©mon will fall to the ground when it's hit.

Move.Name: Storm Throw
Move.Description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Move.Name: Flame Burst
Move.Description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pok√©mon next to the target as well.

Move.Name: Sludge Wave
Move.Description: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

Move.Name: Quiver Dance
Move.Description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

Move.Name: Heavy Slam
Move.Description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Synchronoise
Move.Description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pok√©mon of the same type in the area around it.

Move.Name: Electro Ball
Move.Description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

Move.Name: Soak
Move.Description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

Move.Name: Flame Charge
Move.Description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

Move.Name: Coil
Move.Description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

Move.Name: Low Sweep
Move.Description: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.
